thread.title: Brokerages Cut Sensex And Nifty Target On US Interest Rate, China Worries
thread.title_full: Brokerages Cut Sensex And Nifty Target On US Interest Rate, China Worries

title: Brokerages Cut Sensex And Nifty Target On US Interest Rate, China Worries
text:
Nifty 7,968.30 -33.65 [-0.42%] There have been a host of cuts by brokerages in the last few months. There are worries that earnings have not caught on and most investors are disappointed.
Apart from this there is an air of uncertainty surrounding the timing of an interest rate cut in the US. Strong economic data may compel the US Fed to cut interest rates in the month of December, while still others feel that given the level of uncertainty surrounding the globe on account of a slowdown in China, it would only be appropriate to cut interest rates in Dec. 
The Chinese slowdown has also forced brokerages to cut their targets. 
GoodReturns.in
